name: Andrei Murashev
shortDescription: Hello! üëã I am developer with 10+ years experience (7 of them as remote-worker). I like frontend because I like to see result of my work and I am addicted to create interesting interfaces üòè
summary: 8+ years business application experience and customer-facing products
Strong knowledge of JavaScript (ES6) and TypeScript;
Strong knowledge of CSS, flex and grid layout, responsive design
Strong ReactJS experience
Experience in developing high-performance websites using Next.js and Node js (Express.js)
Experience with CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS, Styled-components, css-modules)
Experience with Payment systems (Adyen, ChargeBee, Stripe)
Experience working with Design Systems (Ant)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
Strong Git skills, experience working with the mono-repository and code review processes
Experience with Agile Principles (Scrum) and Shape Up (Basecamp) methodologies
Unit and integration tests: Experience with Jest, Storybook
Experience working with REST APIs, GraphQL APIs, WebSockets
Experience with React Query, React Hook Form libraries
General knowledge of common web security best practices and vulnerabilities (XSS, CSRF, etc.)
Knowledge of server-side rendering techniques and architectures
Knowledge of how to measure and optimise performance
Experience with build and deployment tools (Vercel)
Familiar with concepts like SOLID, KISS and Clean Code
Familiar with A/B Testing strategy (GrowthBook)
personalQualities: Responsibility: I'm not afraid to take any responsibilities, but I am completely aware and understand how many responsibilities I can conduct that it do not slow down my work performance
Respecting Deadlines: Based on my experience I can predict how much time required for specific task. Meeting a deadline for me it is personal challenge

Effective Communication and ensuring a harmonious working atmosphere: I strive to maintain warm and friendly communication with all team members, I am ready to help anyone (or find someone who can help) and do not shy to ask questions

Work efficiency and Business orientation: I always try to resolve a task the fastest and most convenient method, be oriented on business logic, try to predict these changes on code base and be focused on delivering value
Love solving complex problems with practical, efficient solutions
Prefer simple solutions over complex ones (KISS)
Ability to work well both autonomously and as a part of a team.

employment.shortDescription: Participation in development of the front-end part of marketplace service. Long list of responsibilities during 7 years period. Long story short: pivot role in FE department
responsibilities: Development of FE part of application: implementation of features by Product manager's specifications
Conducting releases of FE part of application
Mentorship and onboarding: Active participation of code reviewing of another developers, mentoring new participants of FE team
Tech leadership: participation in planning of FE application architecture, Participation in development of component for micro-services architecture, Migration from legacy applications to new ones
Interaction with different teams (Design team, Data team, QA team, Product team, l18n team)
Participation in: sprint planning, technical design, demo meetings

employment.shortDescription: Development of FE part of application from scratch. Interaction within engineering team (2 BE, 1 FE, 1 Mobile developer)
responsibilities: Development of FE part of application
Participation in development of component for micro-services architecture
Conducting releases of FE part of application
Interaction with product team on all specification related questions

employment.shortDescription: Participation of development of FE part of company services. Interaction with FE and BE development teams
Implementation of FE part of access control and management system
employment.description:
